metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17358 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (akalibbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.31. An invalid memory accessexists in _bfd_stab_section_find_nearest_line in syms.c. Attackers couldleverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service (applicationcrash) via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
